# Generated by pandoc-plot 0.8.0.0

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import array as arr
import math as math

f = arr.array('f')
f.append(0)
f.append(0)
f.append(1)
x = arr.array('f')
x.append(-1)
x.append(-0)
x.append(1)

plt.figure()
plt.plot(x, f)
plt.xlabel('$x$')
plt.ylabel('$\max(0, x)$')
plt.title('Rectifier function')
